languages.text:
The Commissar's pistol has +15% Crit Chance, {uip|FELBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% bonus Dodge Reduction, and deals {uip|BSBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% additional damage.
This effect is active only when the pistol is equipped in the right hand.

traits.locale_text:
The Commissar's pistol has +15% Crit Chance, {uip|FELBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% bonus Dodge Reduction, and deals {uip|BSBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% additional damage.
This effect is active only when the pistol is equipped in the right hand.

languages.text: Shots with a pistol in their primary hand deal +{uip|BSBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% more damage, gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}, and +{uip|FELBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}.

languages.text: Стреляя из пистолета в ведущей руке, комиссар наносит на {uip|BSBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% больше урона и получает +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} и +{uip|FELBonus2|1a1ac3e3f133432a8c5c0d19cce16035}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}.
